welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Bad Windsheim! Known for its picturesque scenery and rich history, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kitzingen Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kitzingen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Giebelstadt Army Air Field Airport handles all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Giebelstadt Army Air Field Airport is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, but a password is required for access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nürnberg Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.
